revision_provided: Black hole swallowing and ripping apart star captured for first time
source: Black hole swallowing and ripping apart star captured for first time
target: Černá díra zachycena poprvé, když polyká a trhá hvězdu

revision_provided: A gigantic black hole has been captured pulling in and ripping apart a star for the first time.
source: A gigantic black hole has been captured pulling in and ripping apart a star for the first time.
target: Poprvé byla zaznamenána obrovská černá díra vtahující do sebe hvězdu a trhající ji na kusy.

revision_provided: The star, which was about the same size as our sun, was seen from 375 million light years away warping and spiralling into the gravitational pull of a supermassive black hole, researchers said in the Astrophysical Journal.
source: The star, which was about the same size as our sun, was seen from 375 million light years away warping and spiralling into the gravitational pull of a supermassive black hole, researchers said in the Astrophysical Journal.
target: Jak uvedli vědci v časopise Astrophysical Journal, ze vzdálenosti 375 milionů světelných let byla pozorována hvězda o velikosti přibližně našeho Slunce, kterou deformovala a přitahovala gravitace obří černé díry.

revision_provided: It was then sucked into oblivion in a rare cosmic occurrence astronomers call a tidal disruption event.
source: It was then sucked into oblivion in a rare cosmic occurrence astronomers call a tidal disruption event.
target: Hvězda mířila ke své zkáze ve vzácném vesmírném úkazu, kterému astronomové říkají slapové roztrhání.

revision_provided: NASA's planet-searching telescope, the Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite - TESS - captured the detailed timeline from beginning to end for the first time.
source: NASA's planet-searching telescope, the Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite - TESS - captured the detailed timeline from beginning to end for the first time.
target: Dalekohled Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite (TESS), který NASA používá k vyhledávání exoplanet, poprvé zachytil celý proces od začátku do konce.

revision_provided: Astronomers used a worldwide network of telescopes to detect the phenomenon before looking at TESS, whose permanent viewing zones designed to find distant planets, caught the beginning of the violent event.
source: Astronomers used a worldwide network of telescopes to detect the phenomenon before looking at TESS, whose permanent viewing zones designed to find distant planets, caught the beginning of the violent event.
target: Před použitím TESS astronomové používali ke zjišťování tohoto jevu celosvětovou síť teleskopů. Jeho stálé pozorovací zóny určené k nalezení vzdálených planet zachytily začátek této dramatické události.

revision_provided: Thomas Holoien, an astronomer for the Carnegie Institution for Science who led the research, said: "This was really a combination of both being good and being lucky, and sometimes that's what you need to push the science forward."
source: Thomas Holoien, an astronomer for the Carnegie Institution for Science who led the research, said: "This was really a combination of both being good and being lucky, and sometimes that's what you need to push the science forward."
target: Thomas Holoien, astronom z ústavu Carnegie Institution for Science, který výzkum vedl, řekl: „Byla to kombinace schopností a štěstí a přesně to někdy potřebujete, abyste vědu posunuli kupředu.“

revision_provided: Stars get sucked in when they venture too close to a supermassive black hole, which lives at the centre of most galaxies, including the Earth's Milky Way.
source: Stars get sucked in when they venture too close to a supermassive black hole, which lives at the centre of most galaxies, including the Earth's Milky Way.
target: Ke vtažení hvězdy dojde, když se přiblíží k obří černé díře, kterou naleznete ve středu většiny galaxií, včetně naší Mléčné dráhy.

revision_provided: The black hole's impressive gravitational forces tear the star apart, with some of its material thrown into space and the rest into the black hole, forming a disc of hot, bright gas as it is swallowed.
source: The black hole's impressive gravitational forces tear the star apart, with some of its material thrown into space and the rest into the black hole, forming a disc of hot, bright gas as it is swallowed.
target: Ohromné gravitační síly černé díry roztrhají hvězdu na kusy, část jejího materiálu je vržena do prostoru a zbytek je vtažen do černé díry, čímž se vytvoří kotouč horkého, jasného plynu.

revision_provided: Mr Holoien added: "Specifically, we are able to measure the rate at which it gets brighter after it starts brightening, and we also observed a drop in its temperature and brightness that is unique."
source: Mr Holoien added: "Specifically, we are able to measure the rate at which it gets brighter after it starts brightening, and we also observed a drop in its temperature and brightness that is unique."
target: Thomas Holoien k tomu dodal: „Konkrétně jsme schopni měřit rychlost, kterou se navyšuje její jas poté, kdy tento proces začne, a také jsme si všimli poklesu její teploty a jasu, který je jedinečný.“

revision_provided: This year's Turner Prize-shortlisted pieces will be on display in Margate from tomorrow, with Brexit on the agenda.
source: This year's Turner Prize-shortlisted pieces will be on display in Margate from tomorrow, with Brexit on the agenda.
target: Letošní díla, která se dostala do užšího výběru Turnerovy ceny, budou od zítřka vystavena v Margate a na programu bude i brexit.

revision_provided: Colombian artist Oscar Murillo's work "surge (social cataracts) " depicts people staring out to the North Sea, but with their view of the water and the European continent on the other side of it obscured by a dark canvas, with only a sliver of what lies beyond revealed through a slash in the canvas.
source: Colombian artist Oscar Murillo's work "surge (social cataracts) " depicts people staring out to the North Sea, but with their view of the water and the European continent on the other side of it obscured by a dark canvas, with only a sliver of what lies beyond revealed through a slash in the canvas.
target: Dílo kolumbijského umělce Oscara Murilla „surge (social cataracts)“ (vzepětí – sociální vodopád) zobrazuje lidi hledící k Severnímu moři, ale jejich pohled na vodu a evropský kontinent na druhé straně je zakrytý tmavým plátnem, jehož průřezem prosvítá pouze malý kousek.

revision_provided: The work is one of four shortlisted entries to the prestigious and often contentious annual art prize, founded in 1984 and given to an artist residing in Britain or British-born but living elsewhere.
source: The work is one of four shortlisted entries to the prestigious and often contentious annual art prize, founded in 1984 and given to an artist residing in Britain or British-born but living elsewhere.
target: Toto dílo je jedním ze čtyř, které postoupily do užšího výběru na tuto prestižní a často kontroverzní výroční uměleckou cenu, která se uděluje od roku 1984 umělci, jenž má buď bydliště v Británii, nebo je britského původu, ale žije jinde.

revision_provided: Curator Fiona Parry explains that Murillo's work focuses on the current political and socio-economic situation in the UK. The group of papier-mâché figures represent a globalised workforce, while the black cloth represents the "darkness of the contemporary moment in the UK and globally."
source: Curator Fiona Parry explains that Murillo's work focuses on the current political and socio-economic situation in the UK. The group of papier-mâché figures represent a globalised workforce, while the black cloth represents the "darkness of the contemporary moment in the UK and globally."
target: Kurátorka Fiona Parryová vysvětluje, že Murillova práce se zaměřuje na současnou politickou a socioekonomickou situaci Velké Británie. Skupina figur z papírmaše představuje globalizovanou pracovní sílu, zatímco černá látka znázorňuje „temnotu současné situace ve Spojeném království i celosvětově“.

revision_provided: She added: "I think it's a broader idea of blocking the view, the outward-looking view, to anywhere really. And that gesture of blocking the light. But I guess there is still this sort of glimmer of hope, there is a slash in the canvas, and you can just see the sea on the horizon."
source: She added: "I think it's a broader idea of blocking the view, the outward-looking view, to anywhere really. And that gesture of blocking the light. But I guess there is still this sort of glimmer of hope, there is a slash in the canvas, and you can just see the sea on the horizon."
target: K tomu dodává: „Myslím, že je zde zachycena širší myšlenka blokování výhledu, pohledu ven, a to v podstatě kamkoliv. A zabránění přístupu světla. Přitom tady ale pořád ještě existuje jakási jiskřička naděje. V plátně je zářez a na obzoru lze vzdáleně tušit moře.“

revision_provided: Helen Cammock's video piece A Long Note, meanwhile, examines the overlooked role of women in the civil rights movement in Derry/Londonderry, Northern Ireland that began in 1968. The work also connects to broader global class, race and gender struggles during the late 1960s.
source: Helen Cammock's video piece A Long Note, meanwhile, examines the overlooked role of women in the civil rights movement in Derry/Londonderry, Northern Ireland that began in 1968. The work also connects to broader global class, race and gender struggles during the late 1960s.
target: Video Helen Cammockové {i>A Long Note<i} (Dlouhý tón) zkoumá přehlíženou roli žen v hnutí za občanská práva v severoirském Derry / Londonderry, které začalo v roce 1968. Dílo zároveň odkazuje na širší kontext globálních třídních, rasových a genderových bojů, jež probíhaly ke konci 60. let.

revision_provided: All works will be exhibited at Margate's Turner Contemporary gallery, from 28 September to 12 January 2020, and the winner of the Turner Prize 2019 will be announced at a ceremony on 3 December.
source: All works will be exhibited at Margate's Turner Contemporary gallery, from 28 September to 12 January 2020, and the winner of the Turner Prize 2019 will be announced at a ceremony on 3 December.
target: Všechna díla budou vystavena v galerii Turner Contemporary v Margate od 28. září do 12. ledna 2020 a vítěz Turnerovy ceny za rok 2019 bude slavnostně vyhlášen 3. prosince.

revision_provided: Named after 19th-century landscape painter JMW Turner, the award made stars of Grayson Perry, Damien Hirst and 12 Years a Slave director Steve McQueen.
source: Named after 19th-century landscape painter JMW Turner, the award made stars of Grayson Perry, Damien Hirst and 12 Years a Slave director Steve McQueen.
target: Tato cena pojmenovaná po krajináři 19. století J. M. W. Turnerovi zahájila hvězdnou kariéru Graysona Perryho, Damiena Hirsta a režiséra Steva McQueena, který je autorem filmu {i>12 let v řetězech<i}.

revision_provided: RECOMMENDATIONS
source: RECOMMENDATIONS
target: DOPORUČENÍ

revision_provided: A common recommendation of the NKU and the NIK concerns an improvement of the monitoring system specifically by consistent assignation of proper monitoring indicators for all specific objectives of priority axis of the Operational Programme.
source: A common recommendation of the NKU and the NIK concerns an improvement of the monitoring system specifically by consistent assignation of proper monitoring indicators for all specific objectives of priority axis of the Operational Programme.
target: Společné doporučení NKÚ a NIK se týká zlepšení monitorovacího systému, a to konkrétně důsledným přidělováním řádných monitorovacích ukazatelů ke všem specifickým cílům prioritní osy operačního programu.

revision_provided: Generally, it is also necessary to aim for designing monitoring indicators both on the programme and project level which would enable more operative verification of the achievement of set effects.
source: Generally, it is also necessary to aim for designing monitoring indicators both on the programme and project level which would enable more operative verification of the achievement of set effects.
target: Obecně je také nutné zaměřit se na návrh monitorovacích ukazatelů jak na úrovni celého programu, tak na úrovni projektů. Tyto ukazatele by umožnily operativnější ověření dosažených stanovených výsledků.

revision_provided: Remarks and recommendations resulting from the audits carried out on both sides of the border are included in the separate audit reports of NKU and NIK on CD.
source: Remarks and recommendations resulting from the audits carried out on both sides of the border are included in the separate audit reports of NKU and NIK on CD.
target: Poznámky a doporučení na základě auditů, které proběhly na obou stranách hranice, jsou součástí samostatných auditních zpráv NKÚ a NIK na CD.

revision_provided: COMMUNIQUÉ
source: COMMUNIQUÉ
target: KOMUNIKÉ

revision_provided: The report has been drawn up in Czech, English and Polish and signed by the Presidents of supreme audit institutions of the Czech Republic and Poland.
source: The report has been drawn up in Czech, English and Polish and signed by the Presidents of supreme audit institutions of the Czech Republic and Poland.
target: Zpráva byla vypracována v českém, anglickém a polském jazyce a podepsali ji představitelé nejvyšších kontrolních institucí České republiky a Polska.

revision_provided: Why The Times Published Details of the Whistle-Blower's Identity
source: Why The Times Published Details of the Whistle-Blower's Identity
target: Proč deník The Times zveřejnil podrobnosti o identitě whistleblowera

revision_provided: On Thursday, The Times published exclusive details about the identity of the whistle-blower whose claims led Democrats to begin an impeachment inquiry against President Trump this week. (The article reported that the whistle-blower is a C.I.A. officer who was previously detailed to work at the White House and had expertise on Ukraine.)
source: On Thursday, The Times published exclusive details about the identity of the whistle-blower whose claims led Democrats to begin an impeachment inquiry against President Trump this week. (The article reported that the whistle-blower is a C.I.A. officer who was previously detailed to work at the White House and had expertise on Ukraine.)
target: Ve čtvrtek deník The Times zveřejnil exkluzivní podrobnosti o identitě whistleblowera, jehož tvrzení vedla tento týden demokraty k zahájení procesu impeachmentu proti prezidentu Trumpovi. (V článku se psalo, že informátorem je člen CIA, který byl dříve přidělen k práci v Bílém domě a má odborné znalosti o Ukrajině.)

revision_provided: Many readers, including some who work in national security and intelligence, have criticized The Times's decision to publish the details, saying it potentially put the person's life in danger and may have a chilling effect on would-be whistle-blowers.
source: Many readers, including some who work in national security and intelligence, have criticized The Times's decision to publish the details, saying it potentially put the person's life in danger and may have a chilling effect on would-be whistle-blowers.
target: Mnoho čtenářů, včetně těch, kteří pracují v oblasti národní bezpečnosti a zpravodajských služeb, kritizovalo rozhodnutí deníku zveřejnit tyto podrobnosti s tím, že to potenciálně ohrožuje život dotyčného informátora a může odstrašit budoucí whistleblowery.

revision_provided: We took their concerns to Dean Baquet, The Times's executive editor, who responded to them in a discussion with the Reader Center:
source: We took their concerns to Dean Baquet, The Times's executive editor, who responded to them in a discussion with the Reader Center:
target: Jejich obavy jsme předali šéfredaktorovi deníku The Times Deanu Baquetovi, který na ně reagoval v diskuzi na čtenářském centru deníku:

revision_provided: The president and some of his supporters have attacked the credibility of the whistle-blower, who has presented information that has touched off a landmark impeachment proceeding. The president himself has called the whistle-blower's account a "political hack job."
source: The president and some of his supporters have attacked the credibility of the whistle-blower, who has presented information that has touched off a landmark impeachment proceeding. The president himself has called the whistle-blower's account a "political hack job."
target: Prezident a někteří jeho příznivci napadli důvěryhodnost whistleblowera, který předložil informace, jež odstartovaly ústavní žalobu impeachmentu proti prezidentovi. Ten sám označil účet informátora za „politickou boudu“.

revision_provided: We decided to publish limited information about the whistle-blower - including the fact that he works for a nonpolitical agency and that his complaint is based on an intimate knowledge and understanding of the White House - because we wanted to provide information to readers that allows them to make their own judgments about whether or not he is credible.
source: We decided to publish limited information about the whistle-blower - including the fact that he works for a nonpolitical agency and that his complaint is based on an intimate knowledge and understanding of the White House - because we wanted to provide information to readers that allows them to make their own judgments about whether or not he is credible.
target: Rozhodli jsme se o informátorovi zveřejnit pouze základní informace (včetně skutečnosti, že pracuje pro nepolitickou agenturu a že jeho stížnost je založena na důvěrné znalosti a pochopení chodu Bílého domu), protože jsme chtěli poskytnout čtenářům informace, které jim umožní vytvořit si vlastní úsudek o tom, zda je či není důvěryhodný.

revision_provided: INTRODUCTION
source: INTRODUCTION
target: ÚVOD

revision_provided: The developing union of people of Europe is the driving force behind the cross-border cooperation as a part of broader territorial cooperation that has been with us for more than 20 years by now.
source: The developing union of people of Europe is the driving force behind the cross-border cooperation as a part of broader territorial cooperation that has been with us for more than 20 years by now.
target: Rozvíjející se pospolitost evropských občanů je hybnou silou přeshraniční spolupráce v rámci širší územní spolupráce, kterou známe již více než 20 let.

revision_provided: Let it provide itself the introduction into this joint report of supreme audit institutions of two close countries:
source: Let it provide itself the introduction into this joint report of supreme audit institutions of two close countries:
target: Nechme tedy tuto spolupráci promluvit na úvod této společné zprávy nejvyšších kontrolních orgánů dvou sousedních zemí:

revision_provided: “185 million EU citizens, or 37% of the population, live in border areas.
source: “185 million EU citizens, or 37% of the population, live in border areas.
target: „185 milionů občanů EU, čili 37% populace, žije v příhraničních oblastech.

revision_provided: These are often peripheral, underdeveloped or marginalised areas- sometimes the borders are historical scars.
source: These are often peripheral, underdeveloped or marginalised areas- sometimes the borders are historical scars.
target: Mnohdy se jedná o okrajové, málo rozvinuté nebo marginalizované oblasti – někdy jsou poznamenány historií.

revision_provided: The main aim of cross-border cooperation is to reduce the effect of borders as administrative, legal and physical barriers, tackle common problems and exploit untapped potential.
source: The main aim of cross-border cooperation is to reduce the effect of borders as administrative, legal and physical barriers, tackle common problems and exploit untapped potential.
target: Hlavním cílem přeshraniční spolupráce je zmírnit účinek hranic jako administrativních, právních a fyzických překážek, řešit běžné problémy a využívat nevyužitý potenciál.

revision_provided: The programmes cover a variety of border regions: some work with maritime areas, others with internal EU land borders or borders shared with candidate countries.
source: The programmes cover a variety of border regions: some work with maritime areas, others with internal EU land borders or borders shared with candidate countries.
target: Programy zahrnují řadu příhraničních regionů: některé pracují s přímořskými oblastmi, jiné s vnitřními pozemními hranicemi EU nebo s hranicemi s kandidátskými zeměmi.

revision_provided: Most programmes are bilateral, but some consist of more than two neighbouring countries (e.g. South Baltic programme).
source: Most programmes are bilateral, but some consist of more than two neighbouring countries (e.g. South Baltic programme).
target: Většina programů je bilaterálních, ale některé zahrnují více než dvě sousední země (např. program Interreg South Baltic).

revision_provided: The programmes last for seven years. It should be noted that there is EUR 5.7 billion in total earmarked for all programmes in this period.
source: The programmes last for seven years. It should be noted that there is EUR 5.7 billion in total earmarked for all programmes in this period.
target: Programy trvají sedm let. Je třeba poznamenat, že v tomto období je na všechny programy vyčleněno celkem 5,7 miliard eur.

revision_provided: “The programme activities include: Repairing and (re)building cross-border roads, cycle paths or bridges; Investing in cross-border waste systems, medical equipment, research centres, anti-flood measures, and so on; Managing jointly natural or tourism sites; Developing common services for the local population; Advising on employment issues; and Creating thematic networks and clusters for innovation.
source: “The programme activities include: Repairing and (re)building cross-border roads, cycle paths or bridges; Investing in cross-border waste systems, medical equipment, research centres, anti-flood measures, and so on; Managing jointly natural or tourism sites; Developing common services for the local population; Advising on employment issues; and Creating thematic networks and clusters for innovation.
target: „Mezi aktivity programu patří: opravy a (opětovné) budování přeshraničních silnic, cyklostezek nebo mostů; investice do přeshraničních odpadních systémů, zdravotnického vybavení, výzkumných středisek, protipovodňových opatření atd.; společná správa přírodních lokalit a turistických míst; rozvoj společných služeb pro místní obyvatelstvo; poradenství v otázkách zaměstnanosti; a vytváření tematických sítí a klastrů pro inovace.

revision_provided: The funding is granted on condition that organisations from both sides of the border, such as regional authorities, universities and small and medium enterprises, come together to implement projects based on the needs of the border region.
source: The funding is granted on condition that organisations from both sides of the border, such as regional authorities, universities and small and medium enterprises, come together to implement projects based on the needs of the border region.
target: Financování se poskytuje za podmínky, že organizace z obou stran hranice, tedy například regionální orgány, univerzity a malé a střední podniky, společně realizují projekty založené na potřebách příhraničního regionu.

revision_provided: Representatives of cooperating regions, thematic ministries and other local partners meet regularly and decide which projects are going to be supported.
source: Representatives of cooperating regions, thematic ministries and other local partners meet regularly and decide which projects are going to be supported.
target: Zástupci spolupracujících regionů, oborových ministerstev a dalších místních partnerů se pravidelně scházejí a rozhodují o podpoře jednotlivých projektů.

revision_provided: This unique structure is supposed to lead to sustainable collaboration that continues long after the programme ends.
source: This unique structure is supposed to lead to sustainable collaboration that continues long after the programme ends.
target: Tato jedinečná struktura má vést k udržitelné spolupráci, která bude pokračovat i dlouho po skončení programu.

revision_provided: The funding is granted on condition that partners from both sides of the border work together and fulfil at least two of the following conditions: common financing, common staffing, common preparation and common implementation of the project.”
source: The funding is granted on condition that partners from both sides of the border work together and fulfil at least two of the following conditions: common financing, common staffing, common preparation and common implementation of the project.”
target: Financování se poskytuje za podmínky, že partneři z obou stran hranice spolupracují a splňují alespoň dvě z následujících podmínek: společné financování, společné personální obsazení, společná příprava a společná realizace projektu.“

revision_provided: Within the partnership framework, the tasks and responsibility for preparation, implementation, financing and control of project activities are clearly defined and distributed among the respective partners.
source: Within the partnership framework, the tasks and responsibility for preparation, implementation, financing and control of project activities are clearly defined and distributed among the respective partners.
target: V rámci partnerství se jasně stanoví a rozdělí úkoly a odpovědnost za přípravu, realizaci, financování a kontrolu projektových aktivit mezi příslušné partnery.

revision_provided: The following are main attributes: joint selection of leading partner; joint preparation of project and applications; making of joint agreement of partnership signed by all partners; overtaking of complete responsibility for project implementation by leading partner; total support payments received by leading partner who completes their transfer to respective project partners.
source: The following are main attributes: joint selection of leading partner; joint preparation of project and applications; making of joint agreement of partnership signed by all partners; overtaking of complete responsibility for project implementation by leading partner; total support payments received by leading partner who completes their transfer to respective project partners.
target: Hlavní atributy jsou následující: společný výběr vedoucího partnera; společná příprava projektu a žádostí; uzavření společné dohody o partnerství podepsané všemi partnery; převzetí úplné odpovědnosti za realizaci projektu vedoucím partnerem; výplata celé podpory vedoucímu partnerovi, který prostředky následně převede příslušným projektovým partnerům.

revision_provided: The support can be granted to eligible projects implemented in the regions and voivodeships adjacent to the joint border.
source: The support can be granted to eligible projects implemented in the regions and voivodeships adjacent to the joint border.
target: Podporu lze poskytnout způsobilým projektům realizovaným v regionech a vojvodstvích sousedících se společnou hranicí.

revision_provided: On the day, month and year written below Marta Burešová, pers. no. 695604/3017 Address: Radimova 8, Prague 6, 169 00 as the tenant on the one hand (Hereinafter referred to as "the tenant") and Karolína Černá, pers. no. 136205/891 Address: Alfrédova 13, Praha 4, 142 00 As a lessee on the other (Hereinafter referred to as "the lessee") collectively also referred to as "the Contracting parties" have agreed on this Supplement No. 1 to the Agreement on the sublease the apartment, of 13th May 2016 (hereinafter referred to as the "Supplement No. 1")

revision_provided: On 13th May 2016, the tenant and the lessee closed the Agreement on the sublease of the apartment, under which the tenant let the lessee use the apartment No. 4 (area 49 m²) of size 1+1/L in the ground floor of the house in Prague 4, Alfrédova 13, Post Code: 142 00, Kamýk (hereinafter referred to as the “apartment in question” and “Sublease agreement”), including the equipment and amenities as specified in the Sublease agreement.
source: On 13th May 2016, the tenant and the lessee closed the Agreement on the sublease of the apartment, under which the tenant let the lessee use the apartment No. 4 (area 49 m²) of size 1+1/L in the ground floor of the house in Prague 4, Alfrédova 13, Post Code: 142 00, Kamýk (hereinafter referred to as the “apartment in question” and “Sublease agreement”), including the equipment and amenities as specified in the Sublease agreement.
target: Dne 13. května 2016 nájemce a podnájemník uzavřeli smlouvu o podnájmu bytu, na základě které nájemce přenechal podnájemníkovi užívání bytu č. 4 (výměra 49 m²) o velikosti 1+1/L v přízemí domu v Praze 4, Alfrédova 13, PSČ: 142 00, Kamýk (dále jen „byt“ a „podnájemní smlouva“), včetně vybavení a zařízení, jak je uvedeno ve smlouvě o podnájmu.

revision_provided: The owner of the flat in question is a housing cooperative "Team of Owners of House Alfrédova 13, Prague 4", ID: 123 45 678, with registered office at Prague 4, Alfrédova 13, postal code: 142 00 (hereinafter referred to as “Housing Cooperative”).
source: The owner of the flat in question is a housing cooperative "Team of Owners of House Alfrédova 13, Prague 4", ID: 123 45 678, with registered office at Prague 4, Alfrédova 13, postal code: 142 00 (hereinafter referred to as “Housing Cooperative”).
target: Majitelem bytu je bytové družstvo „Team of Owners of House Alfrédova 13, Praha 4“, IČ: 123 45 678, se sídlem Praha 4, Alfrédova 13, PSČ: 142 00 (dále jen „bytové družstvo“).

revision_provided: On the basis of the statement made by the tenant in the Sublease agreement, the tenant's husband (Mr. Martin Bureš, pers. no.: 760305/3920) expressed his agreement to the conclusion of the Sublease agreement for the apartment before signing the Sublease agreement.
source: On the basis of the statement made by the tenant in the Sublease agreement, the tenant's husband (Mr. Martin Bureš, pers. no.: 760305/3920) expressed his agreement to the conclusion of the Sublease agreement for the apartment before signing the Sublease agreement.
target: Na základě prohlášení učiněného nájemcem ve smlouvě o podnájmu vyjádřil manžel nájemce (pan Martin Bureš, RČ 760305/3920) před podpisem smlouvy o podnájmu svůj souhlas s uzavřením smlouvy o podnájmu bytu.

revision_provided: By signing this Supplement No. 1, the tenant then declares that her husband has also given his consent to this Supplement No. 1.
source: By signing this Supplement No. 1, the tenant then declares that her husband has also given his consent to this Supplement No. 1.
target: Podpisem tohoto dodatku č. 1 nájemce prohlašuje, že její manžel dal také souhlas s tímto dodatkem č. 1.

revision_provided: In Art. III of the Sublease agreement, entitled “Term of the Lease,” the tenant and the lessee agreed that the apartment in question would be rented to the tenant for a fixed period from 13th May 2016 to 31st December 2018.
source: In Art. III of the Sublease agreement, entitled “Term of the Lease,” the tenant and the lessee agreed that the apartment in question would be rented to the tenant for a fixed period from 13th May 2016 to 31st December 2018.

revision_provided: This Supplement No. 1 shall take effect on the date of signature by both Contracting parties.

target: Tento dodatek č. 1 nabývá účinku dnem podpisu oběma smluvními stranami.

revision_provided: This Supplement No. 1 is written and signed in 2 (in words: two) copies, each of which is valid for the original.
source: This Supplement No. 1 is written and signed in 2 (in words: two) copies, each of which is valid for the original.
target: Tento dodatek č. 1 je napsán a podepsán ve 2 (slovy: dvou) kopiích, z nichž každá má stejnou platnost jako originál.

revision_provided: Each of the Contracting parties shall receive one copy.

target: Každá smluvní strana obdrží jedno vyhotovení.

revision_provided: In the event that any provision of this Supplement No. 1 is or it becomes invalid or ineffective, this shall not affect the validity or effectiveness of the other provisions of this Supplement No. 1.
source: In the event that any provision of this Supplement No. 1 is or it becomes invalid or ineffective, this shall not affect the validity or effectiveness of the other provisions of this Supplement No. 1.
target: V případě, že některé ustanovení tohoto dodatku č. 1 je nebo se stane neplatným nebo neúčinným, nemá to vliv na platnost nebo účinnost ostatních ustanovení tohoto dodatku č. 1.

revision_provided: In such a case, the Contracting parties undertake to replace the invalid or ineffective provisions of this Supplement No. 1 by a provision which is valid and effective and which is most consistent with the purpose of this Supplement No. 1.
source: In such a case, the Contracting parties undertake to replace the invalid or ineffective provisions of this Supplement No. 1 by a provision which is valid and effective and which is most consistent with the purpose of this Supplement No. 1.
target: V takovém případě se smluvní strany zavazují nahradit neplatná nebo neúčinná ustanovení tohoto dodatku č. 1 ustanovením, které je platné a účinné a které je nejvíce v souladu s účelem tohoto dodatku č. 1.

revision_provided: The Supplement No. 1 is bilingual.
source: The Supplement No. 1 is bilingual.
target: Dodatek č. 1 je dvojjazyčný.

revision_provided: In the event of a dispute, the Czech version is decisive.
source: In the event of a dispute, the Czech version is decisive.
target: V případě sporu je rozhodující české znění.

revision_provided: The Contracting parties to this Supplement No. 1 declare that they have read the Supplement No. 1, agree with its contents and that the Supplement No. 1 was concluded freely, seriously, not in distress, under considerably unfavorable conditions.
source: The Contracting parties to this Supplement No. 1 declare that they have read the Supplement No. 1, agree with its contents and that the Supplement No. 1 was concluded freely, seriously, not in distress, under considerably unfavorable conditions.
target: Smluvní strany tohoto dodatku č. 1 prohlašují, že četly dodatek č. 1, souhlasí s jeho obsahem a že dodatek č. 1 byl uzavřen svobodně, seriózně, nikoliv v tísni či za značně nepříznivých podmínek.

revision_provided: In proof of these facts, both parties to this Agreement shall attach their handwritten signature.
source: In proof of these facts, both parties to this Agreement shall attach their handwritten signature.
target: Na důkaz těchto skutečností připojí obě strany této dohody svůj vlastnoruční podpis.

revision_provided: A common recommendation of the NKU and the NIK concerns an improvement of the monitoring system specifically by consistent assignation of proper monitoring indicators for all specific objectives of priority axis of the Operational Programme.
source: A common recommendation of the NKU and the NIK concerns an improvement of the monitoring system specifically by consistent assignation of proper monitoring indicators for all specific objectives of priority axis of the Operational Programme.
target: Společné doporučení NKÚ a NIK se týká zlepšení monitorovacího systému, a to konkrétně konzistentním přiřazením vhodných monitorovacích indikátorů pro všechny specifické cíle prioritní osy Operačního programu.

revision_provided: Generally, it is also necessary to aim for designing monitoring indicators both on the programme and project level which would enable more operative verification of the achievement of set effects.
source: Generally, it is also necessary to aim for designing monitoring indicators both on the programme and project level which would enable more operative verification of the achievement of set effects.
target: Obecně je také nezbytné navrhovat takové indikátory pro monitorování na úrovni programu i projektu, které umožní operativněji vyhodnocovat dosažení plánovaných výsledků.

revision_provided: Remarks and recommendations resulting from the audits carried out on both sides of the border are included in the separate audit reports of NKU and NIK on CD.
source: Remarks and recommendations resulting from the audits carried out on both sides of the border are included in the separate audit reports of NKU and NIK on CD.
target: Poznámky a doporučení vyplývající z auditů prováděných na obou stranách hranic jsou zahrnuty v samostatných auditních zprávách NKÚ a NIK na CD.

revision_provided: Why The Times Published Details of the Whistle-Blower's Identity
source: Why The Times Published Details of the Whistle-Blower's Identity
target: Proč deník The Times zveřejnil identitu whistleblowera

revision_provided: On Thursday, The Times published exclusive details about the identity of the whistle-blower whose claims led Democrats to begin an impeachment inquiry against President Trump this week. (The article reported that the whistle-blower is a C.I.A. officer who was previously detailed to work at the White House and had expertise on Ukraine.)
source: On Thursday, The Times published exclusive details about the identity of the whistle-blower whose claims led Democrats to begin an impeachment inquiry against President Trump this week. (The article reported that the whistle-blower is a C.I.A. officer who was previously detailed to work at the White House and had expertise on Ukraine.)
target: Deník The Times ve čtvrtek zveřejnil exkluzivní informace o identitě whistleblowera, na základě jehož prohlášení demokraté podali tento týden na prezidenta Trumpa ústavní žalobu. (Ve článku bylo zmíněno, že whistleblower je pracovníkem CIA s odbornými znalostmi o Ukrajině, který dříve pracoval v Bílém domě.)

revision_provided: Many readers, including some who work in national security and intelligence, have criticized The Times's decision to publish the details, saying it potentially put the person's life in danger and may have a chilling effect on would-be whistle-blowers.
source: Many readers, including some who work in national security and intelligence, have criticized The Times's decision to publish the details, saying it potentially put the person's life in danger and may have a chilling effect on would-be whistle-blowers.
target: Mnoho čtenářů, včetně pracovníků národní bezpečnosti a zpravodajských služeb, rozhodnutí The Times zveřejnit detaily o whistleblowerově identitě kritizuje. Podle nich by ho toto rozhodnutí mohlo potenciálně ohrozit na životě a odradit další možné budoucí whistleblowery.

revision_provided: We took their concerns to Dean Baquet, The Times's executive editor, who responded to them in a discussion with the Reader Center:
source: We took their concerns to Dean Baquet, The Times's executive editor, who responded to them in a discussion with the Reader Center:
target: Jejich obavy jsme předali šéfredaktorovi The Times Deanovi Baquetovi, který na ně v rozhovoru s Reader Center reagoval:

revision_provided: The president and some of his supporters have attacked the credibility of the whistle-blower, who has presented information that has touched off a landmark impeachment proceeding. The president himself has called the whistle-blower's account a "political hack job."
source: The president and some of his supporters have attacked the credibility of the whistle-blower, who has presented information that has touched off a landmark impeachment proceeding. The president himself has called the whistle-blower's account a "political hack job."
target: Prezident a někteří jeho příznivci napadli důvěryhodnost whistleblowera, který svými předloženými informacemi vydal impuls na podání ústavní žaloby. Prezident o této situaci prohlásil, že se jedná o „politickou fušeřinu“.

revision_provided: We decided to publish limited information about the whistle-blower - including the fact that he works for a nonpolitical agency and that his complaint is based on an intimate knowledge and understanding of the White House - because we wanted to provide information to readers that allows them to make their own judgments about whether or not he is credible.
source: We decided to publish limited information about the whistle-blower - including the fact that he works for a nonpolitical agency and that his complaint is based on an intimate knowledge and understanding of the White House - because we wanted to provide information to readers that allows them to make their own judgments about whether or not he is credible.
target: Rozhodli jsme se zveřejnit omezené informace o whistleblowerově identitě, například to, že pracuje pro nepolitickou organizaci a že jeho prohlášení je založeno na důvěrné znalosti Bílého domu. Chtěli jsme čtenářům poskytnout dostatečné informace k tomu, aby sami rozhodli o tom, zda považují tento zdroj za důvěryhodný.

revision_provided: This year's Turner Prize-shortlisted pieces will be on display in Margate from tomorrow, with Brexit on the agenda.
source: This year's Turner Prize-shortlisted pieces will be on display in Margate from tomorrow, with Brexit on the agenda.
target: Díla usilující o Turnerovu cenu budou od zítřka k vidění v umělecké galerii v anglickém městě Margate. Některá z nich jsou ovlivněna brexitem.

revision_provided: Colombian artist Oscar Murillo's work "surge (social cataracts) " depicts people staring out to the North Sea, but with their view of the water and the European continent on the other side of it obscured by a dark canvas, with only a sliver of what lies beyond revealed through a slash in the canvas.
source: Colombian artist Oscar Murillo's work "surge (social cataracts) " depicts people staring out to the North Sea, but with their view of the water and the European continent on the other side of it obscured by a dark canvas, with only a sliver of what lies beyond revealed through a slash in the canvas.
target: Dílo kolumbijského malíře Oscara Murilla „Vzedmutí (sociální katarakty)“ zobrazuje postavy pozorující Severní moře. Jejich výhledu na vodní hladinu a evropský kontinent na druhé straně nicméně brání tmavá plocha, skrz kterou je vidět jen malý kousek toho, co se nachází za ní.

revision_provided: The work is one of four shortlisted entries to the prestigious and often contentious annual art prize, founded in 1984 and given to an artist residing in Britain or British-born but living elsewhere.
source: The work is one of four shortlisted entries to the prestigious and often contentious annual art prize, founded in 1984 and given to an artist residing in Britain or British-born but living elsewhere.
target: Jeho obraz je jedním ze čtyř kandidátů na prestižní a často kontroverzní výroční uměleckou cenu, která se od roku 1984 udílí umělcům žijícím ve Velké Británii nebo britským umělcům žijícím v zahraničí.

revision_provided: Curator Fiona Parry explains that Murillo's work focuses on the current political and socio-economic situation in the UK. The group of papier-mâché figures represent a globalised workforce, while the black cloth represents the "darkness of the contemporary moment in the UK and globally."
source: Curator Fiona Parry explains that Murillo's work focuses on the current political and socio-economic situation in the UK. The group of papier-mâché figures represent a globalised workforce, while the black cloth represents the "darkness of the contemporary moment in the UK and globally."
target: Kurátorka Fiona Parry vysvětluje, že Murillovo dílo se zaměřuje na aktuální politickou a sociálně-ekonomickou situaci ve Spojeném království. Skupina postav z papírmaše představuje globalizovanou pracovní sílu, zatímco černá látka ztělesňuje „temnotu současnosti ve Velké Británii i v celosvětovém měřítku“.

revision_provided: She added: "I think it's a broader idea of blocking the view, the outward-looking view, to anywhere really. And that gesture of blocking the light. But I guess there is still this sort of glimmer of hope, there is a slash in the canvas, and you can just see the sea on the horizon."
source: She added: "I think it's a broader idea of blocking the view, the outward-looking view, to anywhere really. And that gesture of blocking the light. But I guess there is still this sort of glimmer of hope, there is a slash in the canvas, and you can just see the sea on the horizon."
target: „Domnívám se, že se jedná o širší myšlenku toho, je jak lidem celkově bráněno ve výhledu ven. A také o gesto spočívající v zabránění přístupu světla. Nicméně si myslím, že tu stále ještě existuje záblesk naděje, který vyjadřuje výřez v plátně, skrz který lze vidět moře na horizontu,“ dodává Fiona Parry.

revision_provided: Helen Cammock's video piece A Long Note, meanwhile, examines the overlooked role of women in the civil rights movement in Derry/Londonderry, Northern Ireland that began in 1968. The work also connects to broader global class, race and gender struggles during the late 1960s.
source: Helen Cammock's video piece A Long Note, meanwhile, examines the overlooked role of women in the civil rights movement in Derry/Londonderry, Northern Ireland that began in 1968. The work also connects to broader global class, race and gender struggles during the late 1960s.
target: Dalším kandidátem na letošní Turnerovu cenu je snímek A Long Note od Helen Cammock. Ten se věnuje přehlížené roli žen v hnutí za občanská práva, které začalo působit v severoirském městě Derry/Londonderry v roce 1968. Video současně vytváří vazby mezi širšími globálními snahami o třídní, rasovou a genderovou spravedlnost na konci 60. let minulého století.

revision_provided: All works will be exhibited at Margate's Turner Contemporary gallery, from 28 September to 12 January 2020, and the winner of the Turner Prize 2019 will be announced at a ceremony on 3 December.
source: All works will be exhibited at Margate's Turner Contemporary gallery, from 28 September to 12 January 2020, and the winner of the Turner Prize 2019 will be announced at a ceremony on 3 December.
target: Všechna díla budou v galerii Turner Contemporary v anglickém Margate vystavena od 28. září do 12. ledna 2020 a vítěz Turnerovy ceny za rok 2019 bude vyhlášen na slavnostním ceremoniálu dne 3. prosince.

revision_provided: Named after 19th-century landscape painter JMW Turner, the award made stars of Grayson Perry, Damien Hirst and 12 Years a Slave director Steve McQueen.
source: Named after 19th-century landscape painter JMW Turner, the award made stars of Grayson Perry, Damien Hirst and 12 Years a Slave director Steve McQueen.
target: Cena je pojmenována po krajináři z 19. století J. M. W. Turnerovi a proslavila mimo jiné Graysona Perryho, Damiena Hirsta a Steva McQueena, režiséra filmu „12 let v řetězech“.

revision_provided: China Says It Didn't Fight Any War Nor Invaded Foreign Land
source: China Says It Didn't Fight Any War Nor Invaded Foreign Land
target: Čína tvrdí, že v žádné válce nebojovala, ani nenapadla žádnou cizí zemi

revision_provided: China on Friday said it has not provoked a "single war or conflict" or "invaded a single square" of foreign land, skirting any reference to the 1962 war with India.
source: China on Friday said it has not provoked a "single war or conflict" or "invaded a single square" of foreign land, skirting any reference to the 1962 war with India.
target: Čína v pátek prohlásila, že nevyprovokovala „jedinou válku nebo konflikt“ ani „nenapadla jediný metr čtvereční“ cizího území, přičemž se vyhnula jakékoliv zmínce o válce s Indií z roku 1962.

revision_provided: "China has always been dedicated to resolving territorial and maritime delimitation disputes through negotiation and consultation," stated an official white paper released, four days ahead of the country set to celebrate its 70th anniversary of the leadership of the ruling Communist Party of China (CPC) on October 1.
source: "China has always been dedicated to resolving territorial and maritime delimitation disputes through negotiation and consultation," stated an official white paper released, four days ahead of the country set to celebrate its 70th anniversary of the leadership of the ruling Communist Party of China (CPC) on October 1.
target: „Čína byla vždy oddaná řešení sporů o územní a námořní vymezení prostřednictvím vyjednávání a konzultací,“ uvedla země v oficiálním prohlášení, které zveřejnila čtyři dny před oslavami 70. výročí vlády Komunistické strany Číny (KSČ) dne 1. října.

revision_provided: "China safeguards world peace through real actions. Over the past 70 years, China has not provoked a single war or conflict, nor invaded a single square of foreign land," the paper titled "China and the World in the New Era" said.
source: "China safeguards world peace through real actions. Over the past 70 years, China has not provoked a single war or conflict, nor invaded a single square of foreign land," the paper titled "China and the World in the New Era" said.
target: „Čína zabezpečuje světový mír prostřednictvím skutečných činů. Za posledních 70 let Čína nevyprovokovala jedinou válku nebo konflikt, ani nenapadla jediný metr čtvereční cizí země,“ uvádí se v dokumentu nazvaném „Čína a svět v nové éře“.

revision_provided: The white paper, while highlighting the CPS's "peaceful rise" made no reference of the bloody 1962 war with India and the vast tracts of land, especially in the Aksai Chin area, occupied by China.
source: The white paper, while highlighting the CPS's "peaceful rise" made no reference of the bloody 1962 war with India and the vast tracts of land, especially in the Aksai Chin area, occupied by China.
target: Tento dokument sice zdůrazňuje „mírový vzestup“ KSČ, ale nezmiňuje se o krvavé válce s Indií v roce 1962 a o rozsáhlých územích, zejména v oblasti Aksai Čin, které Čína okupuje.

revision_provided: The Sino-India border dispute involving 3,488-km-long Line of Actual Control (LAC) remained unresolved. China also claims Arunachal Pradesh as part of South Tibet, which India contests.
source: The Sino-India border dispute involving 3,488-km-long Line of Actual Control (LAC) remained unresolved. China also claims Arunachal Pradesh as part of South Tibet, which India contests.
target: Čínsko-indický pohraniční spor, týkající se 3 488 km dlouhé linie aktuální kontroly (LAC), zůstal nevyřešen. Čína si také nárokuje Arunáčalpradéš jako součást Jižního Tibetu, s čímž nesouhlasí Indie.

revision_provided: So far, the two countries held 21 rounds of Special Representatives talks to resolve the border dispute.
source: So far, the two countries held 21 rounds of Special Representatives talks to resolve the border dispute.
target: Obě země doposud uspořádaly 21 kol rozhovorů pověřených zástupců k vyřešení pohraničního sporu.

revision_provided: Besides the 1962 war, India and China had a major military standoff at Doklam in 2017 when the People's Liberation Army (PLA) tried to lay a road close to India"s narrow Chicken Neck corridor connecting with the North-Eastern states in an area also claimed by Bhutan.
source: Besides the 1962 war, India and China had a major military standoff at Doklam in 2017 when the People's Liberation Army (PLA) tried to lay a road close to India"s narrow Chicken Neck corridor connecting with the North-Eastern states in an area also claimed by Bhutan.
target: Kromě války v roce 1962 se Indie a Čína významně vojensky střetly v roce 2017 u Doklamu, kde se Lidová osvobozenecká armáda (LOA) pokusila vybudovat silnici poblíž úzkého indického koridoru, takzvaného Kuřecího krku, který k Indii připojuje severovýchodní státy v oblasti, kterou si nárokuje také Bhútán.

revision_provided: It was finally diplomatically resolved after which both sides pulled back their troops.
source: It was finally diplomatically resolved after which both sides pulled back their troops.
target: Tento spor byl nakonec diplomaticky vyřešen a obě strany stáhly své vojáky.

revision_provided: China also had a major military conflict with Vietnam in 1979. China claims sovereignty over all of South China Sea. Vietnam, Malaysia, the Philippines, Brunei and Taiwan have counter claims.
source: China also had a major military conflict with Vietnam in 1979. China claims sovereignty over all of South China Sea. Vietnam, Malaysia, the Philippines, Brunei and Taiwan have counter claims.
target: Čína měla také významný vojenský konflikt s Vietnamem v roce 1979. Čína si nárokuje suverenitu nad celým Jihočínským mořem. Avšak Vietnam, Malajsie, Filipíny, Brunej a Tchaj-wan mají námitky.

revision_provided: "China has achieved full resolution of land border delimitation problems with 12 of its 14 neighbouring countries, and delineated the China-Vietnam maritime boundary in the Beibu Gulf," the white paper said, noting that since reform and opening up in 1978, the country has cut its armed forces "by over four million."
source: "China has achieved full resolution of land border delimitation problems with 12 of its 14 neighbouring countries, and delineated the China-Vietnam maritime boundary in the Beibu Gulf," the white paper said, noting that since reform and opening up in 1978, the country has cut its armed forces "by over four million."
target: „Čína dosáhla řešení problémů s vymezením pozemních hranic s 12 ze 14 sousedních zemí a vymezila čínsko-vietnamskou námořní hranici v Tonkinském zálivu,“ uvedl oficiální dokument s tím, že od reformy a otevření země v roce 1978 snížila Čína své ozbrojené síly „o více než čtyři miliony“.

revision_provided: The two-million strong Chinese military still remain the world's largest.
source: The two-million strong Chinese military still remain the world's largest.
target: Dvoumilionová čínská armáda však stále zůstává největší na světě.

revision_provided: Black hole swallowing and ripping apart star captured for first time
source: Black hole swallowing and ripping apart star captured for first time
target: Černá díra poprvé zachycena při trhání a polykání hvězdy

revision_provided: A gigantic black hole has been captured pulling in and ripping apart a star for the first time.
source: A gigantic black hole has been captured pulling in and ripping apart a star for the first time.
target: Máme vůbec první snímek zobrazující obří černou díru, jak do sebe vtahuje hvězdu, kterou následně roztrhá.

revision_provided: The star, which was about the same size as our sun, was seen from 375 million light years away warping and spiralling into the gravitational pull of a supermassive black hole, researchers said in the Astrophysical Journal.
source: The star, which was about the same size as our sun, was seen from 375 million light years away warping and spiralling into the gravitational pull of a supermassive black hole, researchers said in the Astrophysical Journal.
target: Hvězda, která byla asi stejně velká jako naše Slunce, byla zpozorována 375 milionů světelných let daleko, jak je přitahována a nasávána gravitační silou supermasivní černé díry, jak uvádí vědci v časopise Astrophysical Journal.

revision_provided: It was then sucked into oblivion in a rare cosmic occurrence astronomers call a tidal disruption event.
source: It was then sucked into oblivion in a rare cosmic occurrence astronomers call a tidal disruption event.
target: Následně do ní byla vtažena a došlo ke kosmickému fenoménu, který astronomové označují za tzv. „slapové trhání“.

revision_provided: NASA's planet-searching telescope, the Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite - TESS - captured the detailed timeline from beginning to end for the first time.
source: NASA's planet-searching telescope, the Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite - TESS - captured the detailed timeline from beginning to end for the first time.
target: Satelit TESS (satelit pro výzkum tranzitujících exoplanet) vypuštěný NASA jako první zachytil událost na detailní časové ose od začátku do konce.

revision_provided: Astronomers used a worldwide network of telescopes to detect the phenomenon before looking at TESS, whose permanent viewing zones designed to find distant planets, caught the beginning of the violent event.
source: Astronomers used a worldwide network of telescopes to detect the phenomenon before looking at TESS, whose permanent viewing zones designed to find distant planets, caught the beginning of the violent event.
target: Astronomové se jev snažili identifikovat pomocí celosvětové sítě teleskopů, a teprve pak vyzkoušeli satelit TESS, jenž se zaměřuje na stále stejnou oblast vesmíru, kde hledá vzdálené planety; ten zachytil i začátek této agresivní události.

revision_provided: Thomas Holoien, an astronomer for the Carnegie Institution for Science who led the research, said: "This was really a combination of both being good and being lucky, and sometimes that's what you need to push the science forward."
source: Thomas Holoien, an astronomer for the Carnegie Institution for Science who led the research, said: "This was really a combination of both being good and being lucky, and sometimes that's what you need to push the science forward."
target: Thomas Holoien, astronom pracující pro organizaci Carnegie Institution for Science, který výzkum vedl, řekl: „Byla to kombinace skvělých schopností a čistého štěstí. Někdy je přesně tohle potřeba, aby se věda posunula kupředu.“

revision_provided: Stars get sucked in when they venture too close to a supermassive black hole, which lives at the centre of most galaxies, including the Earth's Milky Way.
source: Stars get sucked in when they venture too close to a supermassive black hole, which lives at the centre of most galaxies, including the Earth's Milky Way.
target: Obří černá díra, která žije ve středu většiny galaxií, a to včetně Mléčné dráhy, kde se nachází Země, do sebe může vtáhnout hvězdu, která se zatoulá do její blízkosti.

revision_provided: The black hole's impressive gravitational forces tear the star apart, with some of its material thrown into space and the rest into the black hole, forming a disc of hot, bright gas as it is swallowed.
source: The black hole's impressive gravitational forces tear the star apart, with some of its material thrown into space and the rest into the black hole, forming a disc of hot, bright gas as it is swallowed.
target: Působivé gravitační síly černé díry hvězdu roztrhají na kusy. Část hvězdného materiálu se rozpráší ve vesmíru a zbytek spadne do černé díry, přičemž vzniká kotouč horkého zářivého plynu.

revision_provided: Mr Holoien added: "Specifically, we are able to measure the rate at which it gets brighter after it starts brightening, and we also observed a drop in its temperature and brightness that is unique."
source: Mr Holoien added: "Specifically, we are able to measure the rate at which it gets brighter after it starts brightening, and we also observed a drop in its temperature and brightness that is unique."
target: Pan Holoien k tomu dodal: „Jsme schopni změřit rychlost, jakou k rozjasnění dochází v momentě, kdy kotouč začne zářit, a také jsme identifikovali pokles teploty a jasu, což je bezprecedentní.“

source: Black hole swallowing and ripping apart star captured for first time
target: Vědci poprvé zachytili, jak černá díra pohltila a zničila hvězdu

source: A gigantic black hole has been captured pulling in and ripping apart a star for the first time.
target: Vesmírné snímky poprvé v historii zachytily, jak obrovská černá díra pohltila a rozervala hvězdu.

revision_provided: The star, which was about the same size as our sun, was seen from 375 million light years away warping and spiralling into the gravitational pull of a supermassive black hole, researchers said in the Astrophysical Journal.

revision_provided: It was then sucked into oblivion in a rare cosmic occurrence astronomers call a tidal disruption event.

target: Díra ji poté nadobro pohltila do sebe. Astronomové tento vzácný kosmický jev nazývají slapové roztrhání.

revision_provided: NASA's planet-searching telescope, the Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite - TESS - captured the detailed timeline from beginning to end for the first time.

revision_provided: Astronomers used a worldwide network of telescopes to detect the phenomenon before looking at TESS, whose permanent viewing zones designed to find distant planets, caught the beginning of the violent event.
source: Astronomers used a worldwide network of telescopes to detect the phenomenon before looking at TESS, whose permanent viewing zones designed to find distant planets, caught the beginning of the violent event.

revision_provided: Thomas Holoien, an astronomer for the Carnegie Institution for Science who led the research, said: "This was really a combination of both being good and being lucky, and sometimes that's what you need to push the science forward."
source: Thomas Holoien, an astronomer for the Carnegie Institution for Science who led the research, said: "This was really a combination of both being good and being lucky, and sometimes that's what you need to push the science forward."

source: Stars get sucked in when they venture too close to a supermassive black hole, which lives at the centre of most galaxies, including the Earth's Milky Way.

revision_provided: The black hole's impressive gravitational forces tear the star apart, with some of its material thrown into space and the rest into the black hole, forming a disc of hot, bright gas as it is swallowed.

revision_provided: Mr Holoien added: "Specifically, we are able to measure the rate at which it gets brighter after it starts brightening, and we also observed a drop in its temperature and brightness that is unique."
